claims.claim: Reentry programs should include financial literacy education.
claims.quote: I have another program called Free Donors Receive Education and Employment and it goes through ... I have a CPA that does the financial literacy part because we need to learn how to manage our money better ...

claims.claim: Programs teaching resume writing and interview preparation are essential for reentering citizens.
claims.quote: Writing your resume. We do mock interviews because at the interview, they're gonna look at your resume and see there's a gap in your resume and you have to explain that gap ...

claims.claim: Financial literacy education for formerly incarcerated individuals is overdue and necessary.
claims.quote: ... we need to learn how to manage our money better than. Better than we our parents did. 'cause a lot of us didn't get the financial literacy part and they don't teach it in school.

claims.claim: Formerly incarcerated individuals need specific support to navigate banking systems.
claims.quote: I have a lady that helps people with banking. So if you have a banking problem, you gotta go through her banking course she give you a year and then she'll straighten you out.
